name: Imigino Video Connect
author: Publishers Toolbox

sections.description: Do you need help rendering Imigino videos natively from within WordPress? With this plugin, developed by Publishers Toolbox, you have the power to render your video short-codes on posts and pages as the powerful Imigino video player, with full adaptive bitstream and video monetisation support.
sections.installation:
To install, search for ‘Imigino Video Connect’ under plugins, download and activate.

On the plugin settings page, set the Customer ID (CID) and Imigino video service URL obtained from your Imigino support representative. That’s it!

Any video short-codes added will render as your branded Imigino Video player. For support queries please get in touch via our product website at publisherstoolbox.

Usage

Use the shortcode in your content area: [imigino_video url="https://yourvideourl.com/id/1234"]

1.0.7

  • Tested with WordPress 5.5.3

short_description: Imigino video player integration plugin. Embed your fully customisable Imigino video player into your WordPress content.
description: Do you need help rendering Imigino videos natively from within WordPress?
